{"id":722359977,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1655239206,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/722359977/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"12.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int max1 = 0;\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(word1.size()+1, vector<int>(word2.size()+1, 0));\n        for (int i = 0; i <= word1.size(); ++i) {\n            \n            for (int j = 0; j <= word2.size(); ++j) {\n                \n                if (i == 0 || j == 0)\n                    dp[i][j] = i+j;\n                else if (word1[i-1] == word2[j-1]) {\n                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j-1];\n                } else {\n                    dp[i][j] = 1+min(dp[i-1][j], dp[i][j-1]);\n                }\n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n        return dp[word1.size()][word2.size()];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false}
